column1: '''''The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1984''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] in [[1983]]. It features art by [[Roger Garland]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
